thread.title: Mr and Mrs Eckersley
thread.title_full: Mr and Mrs Eckersley - Review of Novotel London West, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: jrecko
title: Mr and Mrs Eckersley
text: The amazing staff have been very friendly and helpful everyday we have stayed at the Novotel London West. We have enjoyed all of the very clean and beautiful amenities supplied by the Hotel and staff. Right from our first day, we were welcomed. The staff prepared our room earlier as we arrived before normal booking in times. All staff have assisted us with every enquiry in a very helpful manner. Out breakfast buffet has been so lovely every morning. The staff especially Gyurhitsa has welcomed us each morning with a very friendly and helpful manner. The food variety is one of the best we have seen. Thanks to the friendly assistance of Gyurhitsa for helping make our stay so enjoyable.
